channel.title: Maverick's Ghosts Server Beta Launch! [PI] 317 w/ 508+602
channel.description:
Title pretty much says it all.
First of all, staff is only given to players with at least 24 hours of in-game playtime; with good grammar, and high maturity levels. I myself am very mature, so this won't be a 12 year old running this server.
I will have it online as much as possible, and I'm probably going to get VPS soon. I will keep updates coming, when I'm not heavily loaded with schoolwork.
This IS NOT an easy server. You will not get every item within 10 hours, you WILL work for skills, and money won't be easy to come by. There are not ::pure, ::setlevel, or ::master commands for regular players. They are admin only, and admins are REQUIRED to use the command ::master upon promotion.\ Pking is for regular players. Mods may only pk other mods, and admins pk other admins. If they want to pk with lwoer ranks, they must create a new account.
[b]What I've added:[/b]
[ul][li]In Game Play Time Gamble System- Credits to Owner Chaos Better Combat Only two starters per IP +7-8 shops, moved all shops to KBD, w/ command ::shops 15+ new commands 2 Dupes fixed New home Item slots on some important items fixed Clan chat fixed Fireworks on levelup Lagg fixes, reduced by 30%+ Exploits/crashes fixed No longer have to log in and out for Jad to start!! Caskets! +More that I don't remember. [/li] [li][/li][/ul]
[b] TO ADD:[/b]
[ul][li]Clue Scrolls/Treasure Trails? Slayer Summoning??? More item slots need fixing GWD/Tormented demon/add better boss drops[/li] [li][/li][/ul]
What it already had:
"Server Features:
Better Firemaking Better Cooking Better Fishing Better Mining Better Prayer Better Crafting Better Fletching Better Woodcutting Full 63 wave jad All Current PI Minigames (Apart from pest control needs a few fixes) Clipped Following Ancient Prayers (Need to fix headIcons)
Client Features:
Cache Packed 602 Animations & Gfx Cache Packed 508 Maps & Objects Cache Packed 634 Items Cache Packed 602 Npc's Cache Packed 633 Characters Toggling buttons changing HP Above head and name above head plus more Perfect Hitmarks with fading Perfect Orbs Custom Interfaces"
Quote from C++ Imbued. (Project Perfection Base) Now for pictures, because that's what everyone always wants to see..
Credits:
Kleber883 C++ Imbued Wtf Ur Zerk 01053 Sanity Zanix

item.title: Maverick's Ghosts Server Beta Launch! [PI] 317 w/ 508+602
item.dc:creator: @kleber883 kleber883
item.description:
@kleber883 wrote:

Title pretty much says it all.

First of all, staff is only given to players with at least 24 hours of in-game playtime; with good grammar, and high maturity levels. I myself am very mature, so this won’t be a 12 year old running this server.

I will have it online as much as possible, and I’m probably going to get VPS soon.
I will keep updates coming, when I’m not heavily loaded with schoolwork.

This IS NOT an easy server. You will not get every item within 10 hours, you WILL work for skills, and money won’t be easy to come by.
There are not ::pure, ::setlevel, or ::master commands for regular players. They are admin only, and admins are REQUIRED to use the command ::master upon promotion.
Pking is for regular players. Mods may only pk other mods, and admins pk other admins. If they want to pk with lwoer ranks, they must create a new account.

What I’ve added:

[ul][li]In Game Play Time
Gamble System- Credits to Owner Chaos
Better Combat
Only two starters per IP
+7-8 shops, moved all shops to KBD, w/ command ::shops
15+ new commands
2 Dupes fixed
New home
Item slots on some important items fixed
Clan chat fixed
Fireworks on levelup
Lagg fixes, reduced by 30%+
Exploits/crashes fixed
No longer have to log in and out for Jad to start!!
Caskets!
+More that I don’t remember.
[/li]
[li][/li][/ul]

TO ADD:

[ul][li]Clue Scrolls/Treasure Trails?
Slayer
Summoning???
More item slots need fixing
GWD/Tormented demon/add better boss drops[/li]
[li][/li][/ul]

What it already had:

"Server Features:

Better Firemaking
Better Cooking
Better Fishing
Better Mining
Better Prayer
Better Crafting
Better Fletching
Better Woodcutting
Full 63 wave jad
All Current PI Minigames (Apart from pest control needs a few fixes)
Clipped Following
Ancient Prayers (Need to fix headIcons)

Client Features:

Cache Packed 602 Animations & Gfx
Cache Packed 508 Maps & Objects
Cache Packed 634 Items
Cache Packed 602 Npc's
Cache Packed 633 Characters
Toggling buttons changing HP Above head and name above head plus more
Perfect Hitmarks with fading
Perfect Orbs
Custom Interfaces"

Quote from C++ Imbued. (Project Perfection Base)
Now for pictures, because that’s what everyone always wants to see…

Credits:

Kleber883
C++ Imbued
Wtf Ur Zerk
01053
Sanity
Zanix
